snippet: It is not yet clear whether the selection of apps in the Windows Phone Marketplace will be enough to convince smartphone shoppers to come on board. While many of the must-have mobile applications are available, many are missing. What are your...
abstract: It is not yet clear whether the selection of apps in the Windows Phone Marketplace will be enough to convince smartphone shoppers to come on board. While many of the must-have mobile applications are available, many are missing. What are your must-have apps?

headline.main: What Must-Have Apps Is Microsoft Missing?
